types:type.name: GetRoutesResponse
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type GetRoutesResponse = Array<{| companyCode: String, originLocation: {| locationCode: String, locationDesc: String |}, destinationLocation: {| locationCode: String, locationDesc: String |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"companyCode\\\":\\\"TransNational\\\",\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Beauna Vista Singapore\\\"},\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Klang Malaysia\\\"}}]"}

types:type.name: GetSchedulesReponse
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type GetSchedulesReponse = {| departureSchedules: Array<{| availableSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDateTime: String, travelRoute: {| destinationLocation: {| locationCode: String, locationDesc: String |}, originLocation: {| locationCode: String, locationDesc: String |} |} |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"departureSchedules\\\":[{\\\"availableSeats\\\":20,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2019-04-30T16:41:41\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Klang Malaysia\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Beauna Vista Singapore\\\"}}},{\\\"availableSeats\\\":30,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2019-04-30T18:41:41\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Klang Malaysia\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BL-SG\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Beauna Vista Singapore\\\"}}}]}"}

types:type.name: GetSchedulesFirstCoachResponse
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type GetSchedulesFirstCoachResponse = {| departureSchedules: Array<{| availableSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDateTime: String, travelRoute: {| destinationLocation: {| locationCode: String |}, originLocation: {| locationCode: String |} |} |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"departureSchedules\\\":[{\\\"availableSeats\\\":20,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2019-04-30T16:41:41.090Z\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\"}}},{\\\"availableSeats\\\":30,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2019-04-30T16:41:41.090Z\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BL-SG\\\"}}}]}"}
